ComicInfo.Summary:
FINAL ISSUE!
All bets are off as Baba Yaga and Dartanian team up to save Avril from Liza and the coven. It's a race against the clock because if Liza consumes Avril, she'll absorb her power and become so powerful, nothing will be able to stop her.
Alliances between witches and crusaders are tested as true motives are revealed.
This final clash between superpowers is not to be missed.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Douglas Sirois | 1 | B | Cover B | Tony Brescini & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Sabine Rich | 3 | D | Cover D | Tina Valentino & Ula Mos | 4 |
